slides.title: Types of Puzzles
slides.content:
**1. Floor-based Puzzles:**
People living on different floors

**2. Box-based Puzzles:**
Arrangement of boxes/items

**3. Month-based Puzzles:**
Events in different months

**4. Comparison Puzzles:**
Height, weight, age comparisons

**5. Scheduling Puzzles:**
Timing of events/meetings

slides.title: Solving Strategy
slides.content:
**Step 1:** Read all clues carefully

**Step 2:** Identify direct information

**Step 3:** Create a master chart/grid

**Step 4:** Fill definite positions first

**Step 5:** Use elimination method

**Step 6:** Create possibilities for uncertain cases

**Step 7:** Cross-verify all conditions

slides.title: Tips for Success
slides.content:
**DO:**
- Draw diagrams/tables
- Mark "not possible" combinations
- Check each clue after filling
- Work systematically

**DON'T:**
- Assume without information
- Skip any clue
- Rush through options
- Forget to verify final arrangement
